summary: I JUST PURCHASED A PAIR OF EVENFLO COMET BOOSTER SEATS, WHICH SEEM NICE, EXCEPT THAT THEY HAVE "EASY" ACCESS TO THE CAR SEATBELT, WHICH IS WHAT CONCERNS ME. THIS GAPING HOLE IS LEFT COVERED ONLY BY A FLAP OF FABRIC. MY FEAR IS THAT IN A REAR END COLLISION THERE IS NOWHERE NEAR ENOUGH SUPPORT FOR THE CHILD'S BACK. I CALLED THE EVENFLO HOTLINE, AND THEY TOLD ME THIS DESIGN WAS TESTED AND SAFE, BUT IT'S NOT WORTH THE RISK, SO I WILL BE RETURNING THESE PROMPTLY.
